pr_title: Use exclusions list instead of fake system indices

timeline.message:
Use exclusions list instead of fake system indices

This commit switches the strategy for managing dot-prefixed indices that
should be hidden indices from using "fake" system indices to an explicit
exclusions list that must be updated when those indices are converted to
hidden indices.

timeline.bodyText: Not sure this is the best place for this, but it's easy to find and easy to move if we come up with a better location.
timeline.author: gwbrown
